references.reason: This paper details improvements to high-resolution image synthesis, directly impacting the quality of images used in text-to-image faithfulness evaluations.

references.paper_title: Photorealistic text-to-image diffusion models with deep language understanding
references.reason: This paper significantly advances the state-of-the-art in text-to-image generation by introducing models with enhanced capabilities, impacting the metrics and benchmark datasets used in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Davidsonian scene graph: Improving reliability in fine-grained evaluation for text-to-image generation
references.reason: This paper proposes a novel evaluation metric for text-to-image generation, directly influencing the current paper's focus on evaluating and comparing various faithfulness metrics.

references.paper_title: TIFA: Accurate and Interpretable Text-to-Image Faithfulness Evaluation with Question Answering
